languages.text: Говорят, Вольный Торговец заключил{mf||а} сделку с некой сущностью, управляющей миром Амберворлд долгие десятилетия. Скорее всего, это просто слухи. Не мог{mf||ла} же помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора действительно заключить сделку с Архиврагом?..

traits.locale_text: Говорят, Вольный Торговец заключил{mf||а} сделку с некой сущностью, управляющей миром Амберворлд долгие десятилетия. Скорее всего, это просто слухи. Не мог{mf||ла} же помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора действительно заключить сделку с Архиврагом?..

languages.text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?
languages.original_text: Говорят, Вольный Торговец заключил{mf||а} сделку с некой сущностью, управляющей миром Амберворлд долгие десятилетия. Скорее всего, это просто слухи. Не мог{mf||ла} же помазанни{mf|к|ца} Императора действительно заключить сделку с Архиврагом?..

traits.locale_text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

languages.text: 很显然，行商浪人与控制琥珀世界数十年之久的某个实体达成了协议。不过，这或许这仅仅是个谣言罢了，毕竟帝皇的神选者真的会与混沌大敌握手言和吗？
languages.original_text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

traits.locale_text: 很显然，行商浪人与控制琥珀世界数十年之久的某个实体达成了协议。不过，这或许这仅仅是个谣言罢了，毕竟帝皇的神选者真的会与混沌大敌握手言和吗？

languages.text: どうやら自由開拓者は、何十年にもわたってアンバーワールドを支配してきた存在と契約を結んだようだ。しかし、これは単なる噂に過ぎないかもしれない。皇帝の聖油を受けた者が本当に渾沌の勢力と取引できたというのだろうか？
languages.original_text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

traits.locale_text: どうやら自由開拓者は、何十年にもわたってアンバーワールドを支配してきた存在と契約を結んだようだ。しかし、これは単なる噂に過ぎないかもしれない。皇帝の聖油を受けた者が本当に渾沌の勢力と取引できたというのだろうか？

languages.text: Por lo visto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha llegado a un acuerdo con el ser que controla Ámbar desde hace décadas. Deben de ser solo rumores. ¿Cómo iba un{mf||a} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador a pactar con el Archienemigo?
languages.original_text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

traits.locale_text: Por lo visto, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha llegado a un acuerdo con el ser que controla Ámbar desde hace décadas. Deben de ser solo rumores. ¿Cómo iba un{mf||a} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador a pactar con el Archienemigo?

languages.text: Wie es scheint, hat sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit der Wesenheit geeinigt, die Amberworld viele Jahrzehnte lang kontrolliert hatte. Aber das ist vermutlich nichts weiter als ein Gerücht. Könnte {mf|der|die} Gesalbte des Imperators tatsächlich einen Pakt mit dem Erzfeind geschlossen haben?
languages.original_text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

traits.locale_text: Wie es scheint, hat sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit der Wesenheit geeinigt, die Amberworld viele Jahrzehnte lang kontrolliert hatte. Aber das ist vermutlich nichts weiter als ein Gerücht. Könnte {mf|der|die} Gesalbte des Imperators tatsächlich einen Pakt mit dem Erzfeind geschlossen haben?

languages.text: Apparemment, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a fait affaire avec l'entité qui contrôle Ambremonde depuis plusieurs décennies. Ce n'est probablement rien de plus qu'une rumeur. {mf|Le messager|La messagère} de l'Empereur aurait-{mf|il|elle} vraiment passé un marché avec le Grand Ennemi ?
languages.original_text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?

traits.locale_text: Apparemment, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a fait affaire avec l'entité qui contrôle l'Ambre-Monde depuis plusieurs décennies. Ce n'est probablement rien de plus qu'une rumeur. {mf|Le messager|La messagère} de l'Empereur aurait-{mf|il|elle} vraiment passé un marché avec le Grand Ennemi ?

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in, on yıllardır Kehribardünya'yı kontrol eden varlıkla bir anlaşma yaptığı söyleniyor. Büyük ihtimalle yalnızca bir dedikodudan ibarettir. İmparator'un vekili gerçekten de Şerbaşı'yla anlaşma yapmış olabilir mi?
languages.original_text: Apparently, the Rogue Trader has struck a deal with the entity that has controlled Amberworld for many decades. It is probably nothing more than a rumour. Could the Emperor's anointed really have made a deal with the Archenemy?
